author: IANS
title: SpiceJet launches 'Hand Baggage Only' fares
text: Moneylife Â» SpiceJet launches 'Hand Baggage Only' fares 42526 SpiceJet launches 'Hand Baggage Only' fares 0 Comments, Be the first to comment Budget passenger carrier SpiceJet on Tuesday launched a "Hand Baggage Only" fares. The new fare scheme is intended to offer discount for passengers who carry hand baggage only. The scheme will be available on most direct domestic flights with a minimum 30 days advance purchase. It is estimated that the new scheme will provide a discount worth Rs.200 on a one-way flight. While for a round trip the discount can be as high as Rs.1,000. More in Moneylife
